text: The Legend of Bagger Vance is a 2000 American sports drama movie based on Steven Pressfield's 1995 novel and directed by Robert Redford. It stars Will Smith, Matt Damon, Charlize Theron, Bruce McGill and Jack Lemmon in his final film role. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2000 comedy-drama movies Category:2000s sports movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American sports movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Redford Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies set in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies
title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
